all.privacy-policy-intro: TNT System (“we”,”our”,”us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information when you use our TNT Consumer Android application ("App"). By using our App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
all.privacy-policy-camera-info: Our App requires access to your device’s camera to scan and check Data-Matrix codes of products (goods). This access is essential for the core functionality of the App.
all.privacy-policy-media-info: Our App also requires access to your device’s media storage to allow you to check previously saved photos of Data-Matrix codes. This enables you to conveniently verify codes that you have saved on your device.
all.privacy-policy-data-matrix: Data-Matrix Code Scanning: The primary use of the camera and media access is to scan and check Data-Matrix codes. This process does not store any personal information.
all.privacy-policy-no-data-storage: No Data Storage: Our App does not store or retain any user information. The scanned data is used solely for the purpose of retrieving product information in real-time from our servers.
all.privacy-policy-third-party-info: Our App does not use third-party services that collect or share user data.
all.privacy-policy-security-info: We take reasonable measures to protect your information. However, please be aware that no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
all.privacy-policy-changes-info: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy.
